title: Enchanting Polki Diamond and Emerald Chandbali Earrings
materials: Seed Pearls (చిన్న ముత్యాలు). Features Hyderabadi Polish for a rich luster.
features: These Chandbali earrings boast a classic floral design, meticulously handcrafted by artisans from Hyderabad. The Polki diamonds are set in a traditional uncut style, surrounded by vibrant Emeralds. Dainty seed pearls add a touch of elegance, enhancing the overall antique charm. Design inspiration taken from traditional Telugu jewellery.
colors: with contrasting hues of Green (Emeralds) and sparkling White (Polki Diamonds). The seed pearls add a subtle
occasions: Perfect for special occasions like weddings (వివాహం)
or any event where you want to make a statement. Ideal for Muhurtham
or even a sophisticated evening event.
description: These Chandbali earrings are a true testament to Hyderabadi craftsmanship. The unique combination of Polki diamonds and emeralds creates a mesmerizing effect. The earrings exude heritage and sophistication, making them a valuable addition to any jewelry collection. It's a versatile piece that perfectly blends tradition with contemporary aesthetics.
